title: Getting to know me
creator_credit: Eve Ash, Seven Dimensions and Ted Robinson
brief_description: Leon Hustle, Sales Manager, is confronted by his mirror image Noel, after a disastrous start to a sales presentation. He learns to avoid stress and successfully manage his time by assessing commitments, setting realistic goals, establishing priorities, an action plan and allocating sufficient time to complete tasks effectively.
